title: Betty's Lancashire Hotpot
ingredients: ['750g (1Â½ lb) lean lamb cubes', '50g (2 oz) plain flour (seasoned with salt and pepper)', '2 onions, sliced', '450g (1 lb) potatoes, peeled and sliced', '2 celery stalk, sliced', '1 carrot, cubed', '100g (4 oz) swede, cubed', '30ml dry sherry', '1/2 teaspoon English mustard', '1 large pinch ground nutmeg', '3 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon chopped rosemary', '1 teaspoon chopped thyme', '400ml (15 fl oz) beef stock', '15g (1/2 oz) butter + 1 clove chopped garlic']
